properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I belong to Jesus, Jesus belongs to me, Not for the years of time alone, But for eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once I was lost in sin's degradation, Jesus came down to bring me salvation, Lifted me up from sorrow and shame, Now I belong to Him;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Joy floods my soul for Jesus has saved me, Freed me from sin that long had enslaved me His precious blood, He came to redeem, Now I belong to Him;{/lang-eng}
